title: Can the Technology Behind Covid Vaccines Cure Other Diseases?
author: Jared S Hopkins; Felicia Schwartz
description: Researchers are developing tools for using messenger RNA to fight the flu, cancer, HIV and other diseases—but challenges remain.
cleaned_text: Feb. 4, 2022 11:08 am ET The vaccines that have helped billions of people around the world to protect themselves from Covid-19 were a surprise even to their manufacturers. Harnessing a new and relatively untried technology called messenger RNA, or mRNA, the vaccines were available many months and possibly even years ahead of when health experts expected safe and effective traditional vaccines to arrive.
